English: Ish : “Shegin dhyt shirrey jishig dy gheddyn e choardail voish.”
Manx: She: “You must ask father for his consent.”
He: “He won’t give it to me.”

English: Eshyn : “She ro-chribbidjagh eh. Cha dug eh veg rieau da pyagh erbee ooilley laghyn e vea.”
Manx: He: “He’s too close. He never gave anything to anybody in his life.”
